item.title: Three more species of giraffe than previously thought - can you spot the difference?
item.description: Giraffes have always been thought to be one species, but scientists now say there are four.

item.title: Rescued baby gorilla recovers from smuggling ordeal
item.description: Turkish authorities hope the youngster, named Zeytin, can soon be returned to his native Nigeria.

item.title: DR Congo rebels killed 140 civilians despite peace process, rights group says
item.description: Attacks were carried out in more than a dozen villages last month, Human Rights Watch says.

item.title: Bolsonaro planned to flee to Argentina, Brazil police say
item.description: Police say they found a letter on the former Brazilian president's phone requesting asylum in Argentina.

item.title: Russia launches biggest wave of strikes on Ukraine for weeks
item.description: Ukrainian officials say the attacks included drones, hypersonic, ballistic, and cruise missiles.
